reviews.review: топ
fun to play with friends

Imagine not fixing 3 year old issues/bugs but instead introducing new ones. Imagine releasing a PTB for players to test, make them fill  a 15 minute survey and then ignore all of their feedback. Imagine caring more about paid, extremely overpriced and -mostly- poorly executed cosmetics than making the game fun and playable.
Imagine having a game designer mock players on a live stream.

This is a game that desperately needs competition and new management.

este juego en lo personal me encanta, pero lamentablemente las malas desiciones, los oidos sordos permanente de los desarrolladores me llevan a poner a no recomendar el juego debido a que esta realmente roto, hits falsos de los asesinos, a veces pins horribles, permanentemente conocando skins que nadie pide y no preocupandose de los muchos bugs que tiene el juego... con los 2 ultimos parches (el 1ro que fue la "mas importante" pero la mas violenta, destrozaron el juego) que ya es muy dificil subir de sobreviviente, el mal hud que colocaron que dificulta mucho la vista y no hacen un contraste de luz con los iconos de  sangre... aun sigo queriendo el juego pero ya no es lo mismo, muchas skins saliendo y cero preocupacion por arreglar el juego, espero que el equipo de dbd dejen de no escuchar a los jugadores y que hagan en un futuro cercano que hagan las cosas bien
nice

Game is really fun. Has some SERIOUS balancing issues. I think if they got rid of add-ons the game would feel MUCH better. Just balance killers properly. Hit boxes are a mess currently. I am getting hit by Huntress axes when they are 2 full body widths away from me. 

The game devs clearly make updates to cater to low rank survivors. Which makes it near impossible as a killer at high ranks. If you are a killer going against a group of high rank friends who are communicating in discord you might as well just leave and find a new match. 

Meyers being able to just stalk to Tier 3 and insta-kill has got to one of the worst decisions I have ever seen in a game. Also THE GAME map rework has 27 PALLETS in it. 27 pallets in an IN-DOOR MAP. Please enlighten me how that was considered okay and not survivor sided. 

All-in-all it's a fun game. Seriously bad servers, latency and connectivity and the devs could care less about making the game balanced. It is still an addicting game that is fun to play, wish the devs listened to the higher ranked community more though. 

6/10 

Would be a 10/10 if the game had a more balanced concept of dmg/hook phases.

Momentan denke ich, dass das Spiel für Neueinsteiger nicht zu empfehlen ist. Die Devs tun alles dafür, dass Spiel in den ersten paar Spielstunden spannend und interessant erscheinen zu lassen, doch schon nach ~100 Spielstunden wird klar, dass das Spiel nicht im Ansatz für bessere Spieler gebalancet wurde.
Selbst wenn du als Killer sehr gut spielst, können mittelmäßige Survivor dich besiegen, indem sie M1 an Gens halten und jede Pallette sofort umwerfen. Das sorgt für Langeweile auf Seite der Survivor und Stress und Frustration auf Seite der Killer, und das seit Jahren.

Für einen kurzen Spaß mit ein paar Freunden zu empfehlen, wenn es reduziert ist, sonst Finger weg!

Резюмируя.
Вообще, абсолютно нормально отношусь к умственно отсталым людям. Более того, если люди с такими врождёнными или приобретёнными особенностями добиваются определённых успехов в обществе, то я за них только рад. В данном случае, я искренне восхищён разработчиками этой игры.
Только представьте, целая команда людей с неописуемой интеллектуальной недостаточностью и с целыми букетом психических заболеваний и отклонений смогли найти друг друга, создать компанию и выпустить игру, которая стала колоссально популярна в своём жанре.
Я считаю, что мы все должны объединиться и приобретать всё, что связано с игрой исключительно по полной стоимости. Вероятней всего, большая часть доходов, полученная разработчиками с продаж - тратится на их постоянное лечение. Да, оно не приносит плодов и невооружённым взглядом видна постоянная деградация команды, но я верю, что они не теряют надежды.
Прошу Вас, дорогие игроки - распространите эту информацию. Нельзя оставлять без внимания, когда недоразвитые во всех смыслах инвалиды у которых нет шансов на выздоровление - борются за своё право быть полноценными членами общества.

I have to be upfront and honest, I play the game because I like it, even though I do not play here on PC. The game itself is interesting, and the artistic creativity behind the team is genuinely fantastic when coming up with original concepts for killers, maps, and unique appearances for survivors. I have DBD here on PC, but primarily played about a few thousand hours on console (Xbox) before purchasing on Steam.

That being said, the game is consistently negatively impacted by choices coming from BHVR. The developers actively push me to want to play other games and not play their game because of the choices they make and their unabashed carelessness for a product being shared with multiple gaming communities and consoles worldwide. I guess I should just go play Civ 5, right?

The design choices made by the balance and gameplay teams are often questionable or downright stupid. "Fixes" often come with a plethora of new bugs (re: features?) - their most recent hotfix has literally fixed nothing other than now preventing players from combining certain cosmetics that are linked as a set to cosmetic items that are not a set. It did not address collision issues, nor did it do anything to fix the ongoing issues with emblem progressions for killer and survivor. Their priorities often read as completely sideways, and they don't seem to share the same love for the game that the community does. 

I would say that the biggest critique I have of the developers and the game is that BHVR has allowed the community to become a cesspool of toxicity with a "them vs. us" mentality. Survivor "mains" and Killer "mains" actively whine on the DBD forums and reddit about how broken the other side is while the developers sit back and have a laugh. Developers continue to allow people to ruin the gaming experience with tea-bagging, flashlight macros, killer camping/tunneling, and plenty of other "mechanics." Balance changes often seem to be knee-jerk reactions to community outcry, rather than internally tested changes that benefit the game in any way. There are still perks that are never used because the developers show 0 initiative to change niche perks that have seen little to no use at all based on how unappealing and useless they are.

Despite countless suggestions about a "Game Health" Chapter from the community (similar to that of Rainbow Six: Siege), which they have previously addressed in Q&A live streams, the developers would rather leave the game in a state that is unsatisfying for nearly everyone and continue pumping out purchasable content to rake in revenue from cosmetics and a mediocre battle pass that has nothing but charms and a few recolored skins. 

I don't recommend this game unless the developers somehow manage to get themselves together and start working to better the game and community in a positive way.

It is sad to see the real truth about this game. Firstly i just want to clarify that this game is really fun to play with friends. Now to let's begin with the problems. For everyone that is looking for a challenge and wants to rank up, this game is a piece of a nightmare. Lots of problematic bugs after every update. Crazy hit boxes that have been in the game forever. Super toxic community.
With this out of the way, it can still be a great game to enjoy with friends, but if you're looking to play it competitively it's really not worth buying it, since its always full of stupid and annoying bugs.
